Yes, clerics CAN take out ghosts with one blow. That's why you NEVER have a 
ghost without a teammate. The ghost deals with the rest of 'em. The cleric 
gets taken out by the living teammate.

----Original Message Follows----
From: "dph of rules " <dph_of_rules@...>
Reply-To: gladiator@egroups.com
To: gladiator@egroups.com
Subject: [gladiator] Re: egroup contributions
Date: Sun, 24 Sep 2000 17:42:12 -0000

I do not care what experience level, how much armor, how much
intelligence, how much strength, how much dex, how much cons a ghost
has, clerics can take it with one blow.  If I 'was' a ghost, the
first
  thing I would scare is every enemy cleric before they turned me
undead.  Given 100 level 3 elves and 100 level 1 faeries, it would be
easier to take out the elves.  If you disagree, I can create one map
with the elves and use the same map and populate it with faeries and
see which one is harder to defeat.

Mages, Archmages, Clerics, and Druids are the only characters I would
rank harder to beat than faeries.  I can take out all Skeletons and
Ghosts fairly easily with clerics.  Elves loose magic power when
traveling through trees, which implies a certain strategy to use when
dealing with elves.
